src.sql:
IF EXISTS (
   	SELECT TOP 1 SU.Id 
	FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_SpecificUpdates AS SU
	INNER JOIN dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes AS H ON H.ProductID = SU.Product
	WHERE (SU.Priority = 1 AND H.InstalledVersion != H.Version OR SU.Priority = 2 AND H.InstalledVersion != H.Version) OR
	(H.Priority = 1 AND H.InstalledVersion != H.Version OR H.Priority = 2 AND H.InstalledVersion != H.Version)
)
BEGIN
	SELECT '[PAASysUpdates:HotfixesBanner]'
END
ELSE
BEGIN
	SELECT ''
END
